title: Bottled Water
summaries: Bottled Water is a recovery potion and crafting material crafted at a sink or a body of water. Crafting it does not lower the water level and it cannot be emptied on a block like a Water Bucket.
Bottled Water heals the player for 20 <linked>health</linked> instantly when used, which – like any other healing potion – triggers the <linked>Potion Sickness</linked> <linked>debuff</linked>.

The Bottled Water serves as the basis of almost every craftable <linked>Potion</linked> in the game, and is also necessary for the creation of <linked>Flasks</linked>, cosmetic jars like <linked>Jellyfish Jars</linked>, and <linked>Thrown Water</linked>. It is thus an essential crafting material.

statistics.Max stack: 9999 / 999  / 30
statistics.Sell: 4
